summary: This bill, the Poarch Band of Creek Indians Parity Act, aims to reaffirm the application of the Indian Reorganization Act to the Poarch Band of Creek Indians. It clarifies that the tribe is under federal jurisdiction as of June 18, 1934, for the purposes of the Indian Reorganization Act. It also reaffirms all lands previously taken into trust by the U.S. for the benefit of the tribe as trust land and ratifies the Interior Secretary's actions in doing so.
